item.title: database-greeDaos
item.author: liudongdong1
item.description: for new apps we recommend ObjectBox, a new object-oriented database that is much faster than SQLite and easier to use. For existing apps based on greenDAO we offer DaoCompat for an easy switch (see also the announcement). 1. GreeDAO 一个将对象映射到SQLite数据库中的轻量且快速的ORM（ob

item.title: Android_手势
item.author: liudongdong1
item.description: Android关于手势的操作提供两种形式：一种是针对用户手指在屏幕上划出的动作而进行移动的检测，这些手势的检测通过android提供的监听器
